evidence.claim: VGM & Associates mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
The company uses AWS for cloud computing services, ensuring reliable infrastructure for their applications.
VGM employs EDI transaction sets for efficient data exchange in healthcare settings.
VGM utilizes HL7 standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 and HIPAA processes for healthcare data exchange, aligns with target use cases.
